import React from "react"; import { Button, Form, Divider, Header, Segment, Label, Grid } from "semantic-ui-react"; import CheckoutItems from "./CheckoutItems"; const order = [ { name: "Vanilla Milkshake", price: 2.5, qty: 1, customisations: [] }, { name: "Chicken Rice", price: 3.5, qty: 3, customisations: ["No chilli"] }, { name: "Cheese Fries", price: 2.5, qty: 2, customisations: ["Extra Cheese"] } ]; const Checkout = () => (
Deliver to
My Order
 Add items {new Intl.NumberFormat("en-US", { style: "currency", currency: "USD" }).format( order.reduce((prev, curr) => prev + curr.price * curr.qty, 0) )} {new Intl.NumberFormat("en-US", { style: "currency", currency: "USD" }).format(5)} ); export default Checkout;
